w: and You have made me king
as well as on the Sabbaths
He is experienced in every kind
and there were found to be
and He has given us rest
So the people of Judah carried off
along with those from the tribes of Ephraim
and he allied himself with Ahab
You gave us as an inheritance
And when they had finished off
are to be in the courtyards
Then [Jehoiada and his sons] brought out
The accounts of the sons [of Joash]
and assigned them according to their families
and the angle in the wall
they had utterly destroyed them all
as well as to the Levites
and they helped him carry it out
and his deeds of loving devotion
put a hook in his nose
[Josiah] did the same in the cities
they might provoke Me to anger
and because you have humbled yourself
take a stand in agreement to it
What is the issue between you and me
in order to engage him in battle
and his deeds of loving devotion
Then the Chaldeans set fire to
were carried by Nebuchadnezzar into exile
